lexUnit.name: splash.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make (liquid) strike or fall on something in drops

sentence.text: A valuable way of concealing them is to have bars , stripes or blobs of colour that appear to overflow from one section to the next , as though someone has splashed ink across the animal .
Betty watched him as he splashed a little soda in each , and handed her one .
Splashing the liquid into a goblet , he carried the drink back to the bed and shoved it brusquely into Isabel 's hand .
Baron de Tracy grinned openly and grabbed a drinking-horn , splashing some wine into it from the jug on the table .
He splashed whiskey into the glasses .
Edward lifted it and splashed a little water into the teapot , swirling it around .
She splashed water on her face , wishing she had her overnight case up here with her , wondering if it would be possible to make a deal with Ace .
The extreme force of the blows had splashed blood on the walls and ceilings .
The Church of England vicar blessed the Northamp stately home , splashed holy water on the walls and said prayers to ward off the spirit .
Cupping his hands in the large jug , he splashed cold water over his face and chest , rubbing it up and down his arms before towelling himself down .
I splashed water over my face , slicked unruly grey hair into a more reasonable disorder , and headed down to the lobby again .
In fact , she thought as she splashed cold water on to her hot face , she had n't seen him all morning -- perhaps he 'd taken himself off for a walk .
His friends carry his rigid , moaning body to one side and an older woman splashes him with water .
Bright little bunches of cherries or grapes splashed their large hats with colour .
Then she raised one foot and brought it down with a smack on the water , splashing him , and laughed .
Wine was splashed from jug to cup and then often drained in one loud gulp .
He felt cold , thick fluid being splashed on him .
` When you 've got it full up to the top , splash a bit of Paraffin on the top and put the match to it .
He splashed some down the front of my tunic and was gone .
Eddie splashed more of the liquid against his temples , brushing it back and then rubbing it in with a comb .
I splashed more over my face .
